welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tanjung Morawa, Indonesia! Get ready to experience the charm of this bustling city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tanjung Morawa has to offer.

restaurants.name: Mie sop nenek
restaurants.description: Mie sop nenek is a noodle restaurant located in Deli Serdang.
restaurants.address: Jl Bandar Labuhan no 3 (Tanjung morawa), Deli Serdang, Sumatera Utara

restaurants.name: Bakso  Haji Pakde
restaurants.description: Bakso  Haji Pakde is a noodle restaurant located in Tanjung Morawa.
restaurants.address: Jalan Tanjung Morawa (Simpang Kayu Besar) (Jalan Tanjung Morawa), Tanjung Morawa, Sumatera Utara 20362

restaurants.name: Rumah Makan Wong Rame
restaurants.description: Rumah Makan Wong Rame is a seafood restaurant located in Tanjung Morawa.
restaurants.address: Jalan Medan Tanjung Morawa, Tanjung Morawa, Sumatera Utara

restaurants.name: Budaya Resto
restaurants.description: Budaya Resto is a indonesian restaurant located in Medan.
restaurants.address: Jalan Medan - Tj Morawa KM 12.5, Medan, North Sumatera

restaurants.name: Tirta Burger
restaurants.description: Tirta Burger is a burger joint located in Kabupaten Deli Serdang.
restaurants.address: tanjung morawa (tirta deli), Kabupaten Deli Serdang, Sumatera Utara 20362

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
